mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_list (emp_no, auth_no, dept_no, emp_hire_date, emp_name, posit_no) VALUES (#{emp_no},#{auth_no},#{dept_no},#{emp_hire_date},#{emp_name},#{posit_no})
mapper.select: select * from emp e, authority a , dept d , posit p where e.auth_no = a.auth_no and e.dept_no = d.dept_no and e.posit_no = p.posit_no order by e.emp_name

SELECT e.* FROM ( SELECT q.* FROM ( select e.emp_name, e.emp_id, e.emp_no, e.emp_gender, a.auth_name, p.posit_name, d.dept_name from emp e, authority a , dept d , posit p where e.auth_no = a.auth_no and e.dept_no = d.dept_no and e.posit_no = p.posit_no and e.dept_no = #{dept_no} order by e.emp_name ) q ) e limit 10 offset #{start}

UPDATE emp SET emp_name = #{emp_name}, emp_password = #{emp_password}, emp_address = #{emp_address}, emp_email = #{emp_email}, auth_no = #{auth_no}, dept_no = #{dept_no}, posit_no = #{posit_no} WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE Emp e SET e.emp_password = #{emp_password} WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
